content: राशिः [अश्नुते व्याप्नोति, अश्-इञ् धातोरुडागमश्च; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 4. 132</ls>] {@--1@} A heap, mass, collection, quantity, multitude; धनराशिः, तोयराशिः, यशोराशिः &c. {@--2@} The numbers or figures put down for any arithmetical operation (such as adding, multiplying &c.). {@--3@} A sign of the zodiac.
